metadata.title: CVE-2015-1382 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
parsers.c in Privoxy before 3.0.23 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (invalid read and crash) via vectors related to an HTTPtime header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1382` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.21-7+debu1build0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: privoxy package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.21-7+debu1build0.14.04.1').
